Persistence¶

This module defines the way saved entities (see save method of Agent, Episode, Brain, etc) are serialized to files.

Currently, this is simply done with pickle.

due.persistence.deserialize(path)[source]¶

Deserialize an object reading from the given path.

Parameters:path (str) – the path where the object was serialized
Returns:the deserialized object
Return type:many
due.persistence.serialize(saved_thing, path, overwrite=True)[source]¶

Serialize the given object (return value of the save method of the Project entities - ie. due.agent.Agent, due.episode.Episode, …) to a file with the given path.

Parameters:
  • saved_thing – the saved object
  • path (str) – path of the output file
  • overwrite (bool) – overwrite if existing
